pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Django Swagger Render## Getting Started### Prerequisites- python >= 3.5- Django >= 2.0### InstallationInstall using pip```pip install django-swagger-render```Add 'swagger_render' to your INSTALLED_APPS setting.```INSTALLED_APPS = [ ... 'swagger_render',]```Create the folder where you will store your documentation```mkdir docs```Create the `index.yml` file with some `OPENAPI` or `Swagger` specifications```touch docs/index.yml```Serve your documentation files```urlpatterns += static('/docs/', document_root='docs')```Add `SWAGGER_YAML_FILENAME` setting to your `settings.py````SWAGGER_YAML_FILENAME = '/docs/index.yml'```Add the `SwaggerUIView` to your urls```from swagger_render.views import SwaggerUIViewurlpatterns = [ ... path('swagger/', SwaggerUIView.as_view()),]```Voila!
